title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 457.4 - Maximum rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 457.4 - Maximum rates

State Regulations

If a late payment charge is imposed, it shall not exceed
11/2percent per month on the unpaid balance of any prior bill for service
including interest thereon, less all amounts received or credited against such
unpaid balance during the new billing period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
457.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
